title._content: Image taken from page 21 of 'Idyllic Pictures. Drawn by Barnes, Miss E. Edwards, P. Gray, Houghton, R. P. Leitch, Pinwell, Sandys, Small, G. Thomas, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Idyllic Pictures. Drawn by Barnes, Miss E. Edwards, P. Gray, Houghton, R. P. Leitch, Pinwell, Sandys, Small, G. Thomas, etc" Contributor: BARNES, Robert - Artist Contributor: EDWARDS, Mary Ellen. Contributor: GRAY, Paul. Contributor: HOUGHTON, Arthur Boyd. Contributor: LEITCH, Richard Pettigrew. Contributor: PINWELL, George John. Contributor: SANDYS, Frederick. Contributor: SMALL, William - Artist Contributor: THOMAS, George Housman. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11651.h.8." Page: 21 Place of Publishing: London, 1867 [1866] Date of Publishing: 1867 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002911148 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
